oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Appointment With Music - 1949-04-18 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: NBC/WSM program Appointment With Music, originally broadcast April 18, 1949, part 1. Featuring announcer Ernie Keller with performers Beasley Smith and his Orchestra, Snooky Lanson, Dottie Dillard, and the Dixie Dons.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Snooky Lanson; Beasley Smith; Dottie Dillard; Dixie Dons
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Ernie Keller) -- Theme (Snooky Lanson, Beasley Smith and his Orchestra) -- Ernie Keller announces the cast -- Taking A Chance On Love (Snooky Lanson, Beasley Smith and his Orchestra) -- Snooky Lanson introduces Dottie Dillard -- I'm Beginning To Miss You (Dottie Dillard, Beasley Smith and his Orchestra) -- Snooky Lanson introduces the Dixie Dons -- Everywhere You Go (Dixie Dons, Beasley Smith and his Orchestra) -- Snooky Lanson talks -- It's Too Soon To Know (Snooky Lanson, Beasley Smith and his Orchestra) -- Snooky Lanson introduces Beasley Smith and the orchestra -- Serenade (Beasley Smith and his Orchestra) -- Ernie Keller talks
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: National Broadcasting Company; WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Appointment with music (Radio program); Lanson, Snooky; Dillard, Dottie; Dixie Dons (Musical group); Smith, Beasley
